casebody.data:
In re: Southeastern Eye Center 358A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2016 Douglas S. Harris, Attorney at Law, Scott F. Wyatt, Attorney at Law, High Point, Donavan J. Hylarides, Attorney at Law, James Mark McDaniel, Jr., for Harris, Douglas S., et al. Byron L. Saintsing, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Nivison Family Investments, LLC, et al. Robert E. Fields, III, Attorney at Law, Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, for Jeutter, Jr. receiver for CCSEA/SCLC/SEM/HUTA/EMS/KEPES/DRE.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 13th of December 2016 by Defendants (Richard A. Harris, Castle McCulloch, Inc., and Historic Castle McCulloch LLC):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2016."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 28th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
